sourceDesc.p: This is the feature-file for the 1st person singular communis bound pronoun after a consonant.

revisionDesc.change: For EGY-___ there are no values found
updating references to Zotero IDs via update-bibl-refs.xsl

wib:featureValueObservation.note: the 1.c.s. possessive pron. suff. attached to prepositions of which the base is one consonant or which ends in a vowel is -ay(ya) and not lengthened to -ayyī́ .
